about_the_game:
Experience a love story full of ups and downs together with an introverted, plain-looking cutie working part-time at your ramen shop.♥



In Kurage Life, you'll play as a guy who takes over his dead father's ramen shop called "Kurage-tei" in order to pay off his debts.
In the shop, you meet the plain heroine Mitsuki Ayakawa who is working there part-time.
However, she's a shut-in and super-introverted. It won't make paying off your debts easy, that's for sure...
That's why it's up to you to train her into a good employee and make a success out of your ramen shop together!

Mitsuki Ayakawa. VA: Rin Akimiya

A 20 year old plain girl working part-time at the Kurage-tei ramen shop that you run.
Slightly plump and well-endowed, she's been a shut-in ever since graduating from middle school, meaning she lacks the ability to hold basic conversations. Still, she appears to have her reasons for working at your ramen shop.

A Ramen Shop Management Sim × Pure Love Story





Your objective is to develop a relationship with your plain cutie of a part-time employee while managing your ramen shop.
Grow your shop's popularity as you live out an ordinary everyday life!
Who knows? Love just might blossom between the two of you as you get to know each other better...



Managing Kurage-tei will naturally come with its ups and downs.
You'll laugh, you'll cry, and at times, you'll feel a tightening in your chest as deep pure love takes hold.
And there'll be plenty of sex, of course...

Highly Detailed Sex Scenes




The Dynamic Sex System allows for main sex scenes to be fully voiced and have multiple acts occuring simultaneously in real-time along with cut-in animations!
Mitsuki's reactions will regularly change according to your actions such as rubbing her crotch!
Mitsuki's appearance in sex scenes can be customised, with over 4 costumes and 3 pairs of underwear to choose from.
Whether you want to have her slightly naked or fuck her with her panties on, her appearance is entirely up to you!

Features
- Watch the distance between you and Mitsuki shorten as you play the game, developing into sweet pure love.
- Mitsuki is fully voiced for all story and sex scenes!

- Over 30 base CGs, with over 1000 images including cut-ins.
- Outside of the Dynamic Sex scenes, there are also secondary sex scenes featuring Mitsuki giving blowjobs and handjobs etc. in her work uniform.
"-The game includes the following sex acts:
Dynamic Sex Scenes: missionary, doggy style,
Secondary Sex Scenes: cowgirl, deep kiss, titty fuck, blowjob, handjob, phone sex, etc.
"
- Contains a detailed sex status screen.
- 4 hours of gameplay with an endless mode as a completion bonus.

It will take a little bit of investment before you can really get to know her, but trust us, it will be well worth the effort.
- A vanilla-only story with no hardcore elements or cuckoldery.

Game Screen


Your little sister is a cheery gyaru who's eager to meddle however she can in your relationship with Mitsuki.
*Though there aren't any sex scenes with her, you can still find sexy selfies of her.


You can message Mitsuki via smartphone. Depending on how close you two get, she can send you sexy selfies or even have phone sex with you...!


Adjust how you serve and interact with each customer that comes through your doors. Call out to gloomy customers and cheer them up!


A detailed sex status screen shows Mitsuki's development as you train different parts of her body such as her breasts or asshole. The images for each body part won't just change as you train them, Mitsuki will also voice her naughty thoughts to you.

content_descriptors.notes:
"All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning! This game contains: exhibitionism, anal sex, paizuri, blowjobs, use of sex toys and sex acts."

name: Kurage Life

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 9300 or AMD Ryzen™5 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GT 760
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Experience a love story full of ups and downs together with an introverted, plain-looking cutie working part-time at your ramen shop.♥
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
